name: Blue Whale (itch)
description:
Hand drawn Blue Whale Simulator, created for 1-bit clicker jam.

Programming and drawings by @shiitman, music and chiptunes by Marina Askania.

Swim in an endless ocean, eat everything you meet, destroy the boats, avoid giant octopuses and be aware of harpoons!

And do not forget about oxygen!

Breathing is important and not always easy.
